name: Northern Pirates
description:
Land Hoooo!

Explore the wonderful world of Northern Pirates where you are tasked with navigating the high seas in search of wood to restock your local settlements supply. This is no easy task for any captain as you will have to avoid dangerous sheets of ice that can damage your ship and leave you stranded.
Be on the look out as you are not the only one out on the waters. Fleets of blood thirsty pirates are waiting to plunder your ship and take all your supplies. Defend your self with explosive cannons as you embark on this adventure.
·        Puzzle like navigation avoiding obstacles
·        Simple combat to test your hand eye coordination
·        Supply runs that allow you to risk it all or play it safe

*** Mild use of language in game ***

Web version is best viewed in full screen mode.
